creator: ma.darche@free.fr
text:
Error in build.xml, 
PropertySetterException.class not included in log4j-core.jar

The class PropertySetter.class (which uses PropertySetterException.class),
is included in the created jar, but not PropertySetterException.class itself.

Solution:
Modify the target "log4j-core.jar" at line 237 of the build.xml to include
the missing class.
